text: Hallelujah, I'm a Bum is a 1933 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Al Jolson, Madge Evans, Frank Morgan, Harry Langdon, Chester Conklin, Tyler Brooke, Bert Roach. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: Hallelujah, I'm a Bum (movie)
